title: Writer and journalist Yevhenii Bal killed
description:
Date of Discovery: 2 April 2022  
Province: Donetsk Oblast
City/Town/Village: Manhush

Russian forces took Bal to Manhush, a Russian-occupied city to the west of Mariupol, and beat him in a basement over the course of three days.
group: Killed or injured journalists

title: Reporter Yevhenii Sakun killed
description:
Date of Discovery:  1 March 2022
Province: Kyiv Oblast
City/Town/Village: Kyiv

Sakun was covering Russia’s invasion of Ukraine at the time of the attack in television tower in Kyiv, and his body was identified by his press card.
group: Killed or injured journalists

title: Reporter Zoreslav Zamoysky killed
description:
Date of Discovery: 01 April 2022
Province: Kyiv Oblast
City/Town/Village: Bucha

Journalist Zoreslav Zamoysky was found dead by local residents on a street in Bucha, a city near Ukraine’s capital Kyiv, according to statements by the Ukrainian National Union of Journalists.  Those sources did not state the exact date his body was found and said it appeared to be a "violent" death.
group: Killed or injured journalists

title: Reporter Yuriy Oliyinik killed
description:
location : Popasna, Luhansk
description : Date of Discovery: 26 March 2022. On March 23 2022 Channel 24 cameraman Yuriy Oliynyk was killed in battle near the Popasna in Luhansk region. Yuriy Oliynyk went to war for the second time. He fought for the first time in 2014, when Russia occupied Donbas.
icon :
group: Killed or injured journalists

title: Reports Oleksandr Makhov killed
description:
location : Izyum
description : Date of Discovery: 5 May 2022. On May 4, 2022 

Oleksandr Makhov, 36, a television reporter who enlisted after the Russian invasion has been killed in fighting outside the northeastern city of Izyum.
icon :
group: Killed or injured journalists

title: Reporter Ihor Hudenko killed
description:
Date of Discovery: 26 February 2022 
Province: Kharkiv Oblast
City/Town/Village: Saltivka 

On Freelance photojournalist and documentarian Ihor Hudenko had been missing since the beginning of the Russian invasion in February, and was later found dead on Natalia Uzhviy Street in Kharkiv.
https://imi.org.ua/en/news/photographer-ihor-hudenko-found-dead-in-kharkiv-i45724
group: Killed or injured journalists

title: Reporter Mykola Pastukh Injured
description:
Date of discovery: 28 May 2022 
Province: Luhansk Oblast
City/Town/Village: Lysychansk, Sievierodonetsk

Pastukh was traveling with Hong Kong-based freelance photojournalist Alex Chan Tsz Yuk and London-based freelance journalist Kaoru Ng from Lysychansk to the nearby city of Sievierodonetsk. A shell exploded just a few metres from them, according to Chan Tsz Ng, who filmed the attack.
group: Killed or injured journalists

title: Reporters Aleksandr Ermochenko and Pavel Klimov injured, driver killed.
description:
Date of discovery: 3 June 2022
Province: Luhansk Oblast
City/Town/Village: Sievierodonetsk

Two Reuters journalists were injured and a driver killed after the vehicle they were in came under fire while heading to the eastern Ukrainian city of Sievierodonetsk. The two Reuters correspondents sitting in the back seat were named as photographer Aleksandr Ermochenko and cameraman Pavel Klimov.
group: Killed or injured journalists

title: Reporter Natalia Kharakoz killed
description:
location : Mariupol
description : Date of Discovery: May 3 2022. On March 29 2022 Natalia Kharakoz, journalist, author, member of the National Union of Journalists of Ukraine and the National Writers' Union of Ukraine, and head of the Azov Literary Club, died in the Russian-blockaded Mariupol in Donetsk region.
icon :
group: Killed or injured journalists

title: Journalism Teacher Liliya Gumyanova killed
description:
location : Mariupol
description : Date of Discovery: March 25 2022. On March 19 2022, Liliya Gumyanova, a journalism teacher and head of the artistic department of the Livoberezhny district center for children's and youth creativity, died as a result of Russian shelling of Mariupol.
icon :
group: Killed or injured journalists

title: Reporter Journalist Stefan Weichert injured
description:
Date of Discovery: 26 February 2022
Province: Donetsk Oblast 
City/Town/Village: Mariupol 

location : Mariupol 
description : Date of Discovery: 26 February 2022. On February 26 2022, Two journalists from the Danish newspaper Ekstra Bladet were shot while reporting near the eastern Ukrainian city of Ohtyrka. The pair were clearly identified as journalists on their protective equipment and shouted 'press' during the attack.
icon :

description:
Date of Discovery: 26 February 2022
Province: Donetsk Oblast 
City/Town/Village: Mariupol 

Two journalists from the Danish newspaper Ekstra Bladet were shot while reporting near the eastern Ukrainian city of Ohtyrka. The pair were clearly identified as journalists on their protective equipment and shouted 'press' during the attack.

title: Reporter Viktor Dedov killed
description:
location : Mariupol 
description : Date of Discovery: March 23 2022. On March 11 2022, Ukrainian journalist Viktor Dedov died in Mariupol after his flat was bombed. Dedov was the chief operator of the Ukrainian television station Sigma-TV.

title: Drone attack on Swedish and Ukrainian journalists
description:
Date of discovery: 19/09/2023
Location: Stepnohirsk, Zaporizhzhia Oblast

A Russian drone appears to have targeted a TV crew from Swedish channel TV4 (Johan Fredriksson, Daniel Zdolsek, and Oleksandr Pavlov). The strike destroyed their car, which was marked with a "Press" sign. The journalists and their police escort were returning to their vehicles after filming and managed to flee the drone, but Ukrainian producer Pavlov and the two police officers were slightly injured.

Geolocated from photographs taken at the scene and Oleksandr Pavlov's description in his interview with the National Union of Journalists of Ukraine.

See also: https://www.tv4.se/artikel/2IFgXfZBsnD6AwbIePSzfM/tv4-s-team-attackerat-av-droenarmissil-vi-hade-tur
https://www.facebook.com/vkgunpzp/posts/pfbid03XMdtBBb8jKT9cadtyMuPFcY5z1c4bDrXqJXxEAivKLsvcHYKahbqdQu46dn5Fbol
group: Killed or injured journalists

title: Destruction of a church
description:
Date of discovery:05/09/2022
City/ Town/ Village:Donetsk

Destruction of a church.
group: Source needs revision

title: Two monastery buildings were damaged during shelling, reportedly killing three people
description:
Date of discovery:05/30/2022
City/ Town/ Village:Svyatogorsk 

Two monastery buildings were damaged during shelling, reportedly killing three people.

title: Aftermath of night shelling
description:

title: Residential building hit by strike
description:
Date of discovery: 26 February 2022
City/ Town/ Village:Vorzel

Residential building raided and shelled.  According to the public testimony of a local lawyer, there is no military facility in immediate proximity to the building. However, at a distance of 500 meters from the building is a scientific and technical enterprise that supplies protective ammunition to the Armed Forces of Ukraine and which could be a legitimate target of the shelling. There is so far no information about the victims of this attack.
